function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased energy consumption due to prolonged time spent at home during lockdowns","Impact":"Higher energy bills and increased environmental impact","Mitigation":"Implement energy-saving technologies and promote energy-efficient habits","Technologies":"Smart energy meters, energy-efficient appliances, and renewable energy sources","People":"Homeowners, tenants, and residential building occupants","Owner":"Government, energy companies, and building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate waste management leading to potential virus transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission through contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Implement proper waste management practices and educate residents on safe disposal of waste","Technologies":"Contactless waste disposal systems and waste disinfection technologies","People":"Residential building occupants and waste management personnel","Owner":"Building owners, property managers, and waste management companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate sanitation leading to increased risk of virus transmission","Impact":"Higher probability of getting infected with contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement proper sanitation measures and promote hygiene practices","Technologies":"Touchless technologies, UV disinfection, and antimicrobial surfaces","People":"Residential building occupants and visitors","Owner":"Building owners and facility management"}]}
